title: How to get a free ISBN number for my books ready to publish - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of governmental agencies that you can visit by just doing a simple Google search. You can register with them and follow the procedure to get your ISBN number. Going through this procedure could be a little challenging of you are doing it for the first time. I would suggest you to go through a self-publishing house. As they have an informed information on the procedure and process, they can help you get an ISBN number at ease, with affordable cost. I would suggest you a Publishers from a self-publishing house and understand all the intricacies for the same. Getting an ISBN wouldn't be a hard task to achieve. Hope the answer is of help to you. Have a Great Day!

Amazon will provide you with one when you set up your listing in KDP. However, using a free ISBN from anywhere will severely limit your sales potential. Other retailers will not willingly carry books published by their biggest competitor.
